name: HireMeJs
author: Benjamin Klein

sections.description:
Sometimes you want to hire some person for your Company. Most of the Developer have a look at the source code of your company when they visit you site. So show them some Information and tell them you are a great and hilarious company ðŸ˜‰

If you have Questions or Feature Request, feel free and contact me.
sections.installation:
1. Upload HireMeJs.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Extract HireMeJs.zip
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Go to WordPress Settings -> HireMeJs (SubMenu of WP main settings)
  5. Add the information you want to show the developer world
  6. you have to use <?php wp_footer(); ?> in your Theme so this Plugins works

short_description: If u want to tell somebody something in his Developer Javascript Console use this Plugin. You can use a Figlet as Header and free text.
